title: Never noticed WW was buggy as shit before URF, where they happen 80% faster
body:
Can't latch with Q immediately after landing with R, for some reason

Q latches without holding the button sometimes, don't know the conditions

A target dying while your Q is locked on to latch on them but you are not in range results in being locked out of casting any abilities until you die

others I will post about after this game xd
